replies.body:
May I ask you questions, regarding to the video? 

1. What do you use for recording and rendering?
2. How do you record more than 2 minutes with full size fraps?
replies.body_tagged:
May I ask you questions, regarding to the video? 

1. What do you use for recording and rendering?
2. How do you record more than 2 minutes with full size fraps?

replies.body:
Fraps for recording and movie maker for editing (Im a noob)
I use cracked fraps.
replies.body_tagged:
Fraps for recording and movie maker for editing (Im a noob)
I use cracked fraps.

I use cracked fraps.
reply_to.body_tagged:

replies.body: Really? :)
replies.body_tagged: Really? :)

replies.body: I render at 1080p, but on youtube its always 720p. The recording file size is normally 70GB per hourish. After editing, they get smaller. A lot smaller. I ought to go back and delete some videos for freeing some space. Fraps is annoying for taking up space :)
replies.body_tagged: I render at 1080p, but on youtube its always 720p. The recording file size is normally 70GB per hourish. After editing, they get smaller. A lot smaller. I ought to go back and delete some videos for freeing some space. Fraps is annoying for taking up space :)

replies.body:
My 50th subscriber special has been released here: http://youtu.be/aJd_D4yTQ78

It is half UHC and half Pvp Montages because these are the original series on my channel. Before some of you are like "half of this is on avicus half on another server", I asked some mods, and they said it was fine! Enjoy!

As usual, quality will be bad for 10-20 mins after upload! :)

replies.body:
Hey, great montages!
I really like the music used in the walls montage episode 5 (two men vs the world). Also, great way to end the video with a 3 player kill on Scarecrow!

What is the name of the first song in the video?

I got the second one...
"Midnight City (Eric Prydz Private Remix)" by M83
